__comment: Since JSON doesn't support comments, values with key __comment are used as comments in this file.
General settings
whether to merge all states into one list or display a
separate list for each carrier
display this many most recent states
specify -1 to display all states
the ordering of the states
possible values are desc for descending (more recent first) and asc for ascending (older first)
Output styling
Output format
the only available variable is parcels, which consists of all the data for all
the parcels joined with parcel_separator
Parcel format
available variables are: tracking, data
if merge_states is true, data consists of states joined with state_separator
otherwise, it consists of carriers joined with carrier_separator
carrier format
available variables are: fullname, shortname, states
states consists of states joined with state_separator
State format
available variables are: state, datetime, location, carrierfull, carriershort
the message to be shown when there's no data available
this should probably follow the format of state_format,
as it will be displayed in place of a state.
date & time format
for specification, see http://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#strftime-and-strptime-behavior
